summary: Fadingsignal's fantastic Skysight skin texture, fitted to the body mod SAM.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Skysight skin texture adopted for SAM - Shape atlas for men[/b][/size]

[size=3]I always loved[i] Fadingsignal[/i]'s fantastic, detailed male textures, especially the more natural abs and the fantastic backs, but using the male body mod SAM - shape atlas for men, it was impossible for me to use it. But after I've seen someone tried it, I decided to also try to fit it myself! I only adopted the body normal maps, none of the textures were actually made by me, I just mixed and blended them.[/size]
[size=3][b]Features:[/b]
[/size][size=3]-softer version for Samuel bodies, two version (realistic and more abs) for Samson
[/size][size=3]-more abs changes all 3 Samson textures, the default one left Samson_25 untouched (for more variety)
-bigger size is veiny[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]- 2K and normal maps only[/size][size=3]-no beast race support[/size][size=3]-as seamless as the original
[b]
Install:[/b]
You can choose to install only the Samson files or only the Samuel files, if you don't want both. The more abs version - obviously - looks more muscular, it is based on Ixum's smoother retexture instead of the original textures. It also affects Samson_25.
I recommand manul install copy the Data folder from the selected version to your Skyrim folder.
[/size][size=3][b]
Requirements: [/b]
[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/]S.A.M. - Shape Atlas for Men by VectorPlexus[/url] (and of course all it's requirements) + the original HD texture mod for SAM - REGISTRATION REQUIRED![/size]

Credit:Fadingsignal for Skysight skin texturehttp://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?Ixum for the smooth retexture (I'm using his body hair retexture on the screenshots)http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59944/?VectorPlexus, Earrindo, IxlHunter and B3lisario for SAM
http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/file/1-sam-shape-atlas-for-men-recoded/

Mods used:
Ixum's pubes (see above)
Unreal cinema enb
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37202/?

For more screenshots, visit my Flickr or Tumblr:https://www.flickr.com/photos/123811473@N05/http://fisziskyrim.tumblr.com/
author: LadyFiszi
